name: MIRA Channel
description: MIRA is an integrated last mile basic health service communication, tracking and service delivery platform designed as a front end toolkit using audio-visual interaction with beneficiaries. It ensures timely registration of pregnant women and new-borns, provide time specific health information and timely delivery of health services.

SDGs.evidenceText: The solution has a Mobile toolkit which talks to pregnant women and family members for timely health commucation for Prenatal, Postnatal-care and routine immunisation of children below 5 years.
As per SD5, the MIRA is designed for women to empower their own health.
